name: spo-reorder-list-content-type
title: Reorder Content Types in SharePoint List
shortDescription: This script guides how to rearrange content types in a SharePoint list using PnP PowerShell.
longDescription: This comprehensive guide provides step-by-step instructions on efficiently reordering content types within a SharePoint list, leveraging the capabilities of PnP PowerShell. Streamline your information organization

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
